Carmelo Anthony scored 29 points, Allen Iverson added 28 and the Denver Nuggets spoiled the return of Kevin Garnett , holding on for a 124-118 victory over the Boston Celtics on Tuesday night. Winning this game puts a lot of pressure on us, because if you can beat a team like this, then you can beat all the other teams, Allen Iverson said. "We have enough talent to scare some people, but we just have to bring it night in and night out." The Nuggets even beat the Celtics at full strength-- kind of.
